titleStmt.title: The sermon and prophesie of James Hunt: concerning the marriage of the Lambe, and of the confounding of the Whore of Babylon, and to shew by what means she shall be bought to confusion. Whereof I James Hunt humbly beseech the Honourable House of Parliament, for the mercies of God, that you will read this book with observation, for to see and prove whether it be agreeable to the honour and glory of God, and the confounding of the devill.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, James, 17th cent.

titleStmt.title: The sermon and prophesie of James Hunt: concerning the marriage of the Lambe, and of the confounding of the Whore of Babylon, and to shew by what means she shall be bought to confusion. notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
